旗.definition: banner; flag; (in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2]); administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county; CL:面[mian4]

旗人.definition: Manchu; bannerman (refers to the eight Manchu banners 八旗[Ba1 qi2])

旗幟鮮明.definition: to show one's colors; to have a clear-cut stand (idiom)

旗津.definition: Qijin or Chichin district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan

旗津區.definition: Qijin or Chichin district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan

旗瓣.definition: (botany) vexillum; banner petal; standard petal (of a papilionaceous flower)

旗籍.definition: Manchu household register (during the Qing Dynasty)

旗號.definition: military banner (often used figuratively, usually pejoratively, to mean "pretext" or "ostensible purpose"); flag signal; semaphore

旗語.definition: flag signals (for communicating between ships or army units); semaphore

旗開得勝.definition: lit. to win a victory on raising the flag (idiom); fig. to start on sth and have immediate success; success in a single move

旗鼓相當.definition: lit. two armies have equivalent banners and drums (idiom); fig. evenly matched; roughly comparable (opponents)
